# Draft:Acadiana Renaissance Charter Academy

Acadiana Renaissance Charter Academy
Acadiana Renaissance Charter Academy, otherwise known as ARCA, which will be used for the page, is a K-12 charter school located in Youngsville, Louisiana. It currently has 4 separate buildings on campus. These buildings group the following grades:
Kindergarten-2nd grade (Elementary School Tier 1)
3rd grade to 5th grade (Elementary School Tier 2)
6th grade to 8th grade (Middle School)
Freshman to Senior (High School)
Elementary School Tier 1
I'll finish this later
